quest.name: What She Always Wanted
journal: Sylphie reports that Gatty's training is proceeding as planned, but Sanche's health is in steady decline. Aid the overwhelmed acolyte by picking up the herbal remedy from the independent sutler at Castrum Oriens.
You have secured the potent medicine from the merchant. Travel through the forest and rejoin Sylphie at Fletcher's Cabin.
You return to the cabin to find Sylphie on the verge of panic. /soothe the frantic acolyte and learn what has driven her to such a state.

Following your efforts to calm her, Sylphie tells you of how she returned from drawing water to find that both the Padjal and her mother had vanished. The acolyte then recalls how Sanche expressed a desire to visit a cave known as the Comet's Tail one last time, and sends you there to search for the missing pair...

You find Gatty and her mother inside the cave, and dispatch the voidsent poised to prey upon the Padjal. Sanche appears to have suffered another of her turns, and Gatty is clearly on the verge of panic. Administer the herbal remedy to the prone woman, and wait for it to take effect.

Despite your best efforts, Sanche at last succumbs to the ravages of her illness. Gatty is unable to accept her mother's fate, and the ensuing tempest of aether attracts the attention of an insidious greater voidsent. The fiend, seeking to feed on the outpouring of energy, manipulates the child into losing complete control of her aura. You engage the voidsent in battle without hesitation, whilst E–Sumi–Yan and Sylphie attempt to bolster Gatty's waning spirit. Gatty eventually regains control of her aether, and you succeed in casting the winged horror back into the void. Approach the grieving Padjal, and offer her what comfort you may.

Though devastated by the loss of her mother, Gatty realizes that her newfound control now allows her to leave her isolation in the forest. Hoping to make her mother proud, she vows to study hard, and live a life of happiness as Sanche would have wanted. With Sylphie and E–Sumi–Yan there to guide her, you sense that Gatty has a wonderful future awaiting her at Stillglade Fane.

※The next white mage quest will be available from Raya–O–Senna once you have met the following requirements:
※ FINAL FANTASY XIV: Shadowbringers must be registered to your service account.
※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Shadowbringers.”
※ You must have completed the role quest “The Soul of Temperance.”
objectives: Obtain the herbal remedy from the independent sutler at Castrum Oriens.
Administer the herbal remedy to Sanche.

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: I've been studying as much as I can, but Mama's still not getting better. Maybe...maybe if I work even harder!

dialogue.name: SANCHE
dialogue.text:
Ah, Forename...
Each day has become a struggle to rise from bed. I cannot hunt, I can barely─ Promise me you'll care for Gatty.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Come to look in on us, have you, Forename? Brother E–Sumi will also soon be here to gauge Gatty's progress.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Her studies have actually been going rather well─it's Sanche I'm worried about. Please don't say anything to Gatty yet, but I fear her mother may be near her time...

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: I've suspended lessons for the moment, and had the two of them spend every waking moment together. Treating Sanche has left me too exhausted to teach in any case.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: As for her medicine, another batch should have arrived at the castrum by now. I need to draw the spring water I use to dilute the dose, so would you mind picking up the delivery from the sutler for me? We'll meet back here.

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Mama... Why won't you open your eyes...?

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER02418
dialogue.text: You've come on young Sylphie's behalf, have you? I've got her delivery right here─rushed it through on the back of our swiftest chocobo.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER02418
dialogue.text: Seems her patient's in a bad way, eh? Well, I'll say my own prayers to the Matron and hope the medicine does the trick.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text:
Sanche!? Gatty!? Please, no more hiding now...
Oh, where could they have gone!?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Sylphie seems to be in a panic. Do your best to soothe her.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: This isn't funny! Please! Please, come out...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Sylphie seems to be in a panic. Do your best to soothe her.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Forename! I... Thank you. If ever I needed your calming presence, it's now.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: I came back with the spring water to find Gatty's hat upon the floor and the two of them vanished. Sanche could barely move! Where in Hydaelyn could they have gone!?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Where could they have gone?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: They've run away again.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: They can't have gone far.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Run away? But from what? Gatty was doing wonderfully with her training─there hasn't been another voidsent attack since the river.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: You're right. Gatty's been doing wonderfully with her training, so there's no reason for them to run away.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: ...Ah, I think I might have it! I've heard Sanche talking about a cave called the “Comet's Tail,” and how she wanted to visit it again before...before it was too late.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: I said we'd head straight there when she was well enough, but she may have convinced Gatty to help her sneak out.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Brother E–Sumi is likely on his way. I'll go and intercept him while you head to the cave. If you find them there, make sure Sanche takes her medicine!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Mama! You have to get up...

dialogue.name: SANCHE
dialogue.text: <groan>

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Mama, don't leave me... Please, you have to help her!

dialogue.name: SANCHE
dialogue.text: <groan>

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Mama... Mama, please... Don't leave me alone...

dialogue.name: SANCHE
dialogue.text: <groan> Ugh...

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Why isn't the medicine working!? Mama? Mama! Open your eyes!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: I can't... I'm losing control...

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: No, I must own my fear.

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Feel the ground beneath my feet; the flow of wind and water!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Nicely done, Gatty. You have made remarkable progress since last we met.

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Forename, Sylphie, you have instructed her well.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Don't worry! We'll look after your mama!

dialogue.name: SANCHE
dialogue.text:
It's so beautiful...
Thank you for bringing me here...one last time.

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Don't say that, Mama! I'll learn conjury, and once you're better we can come here every day!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Forename... It is thanks to your and Sylphie's efforts that Sanche has held on this long.

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: And yet, there are limits to the healing arts. Each life comes to an end, and even a conjurer cannot undo that which fate has ordained.

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Take heart, however, in knowing that your care and attention is what has allowed these irreplaceable moments between mother and daughter...

dialogue.name: SANCHE
dialogue.text:
My precious girl...
You have filled my days with love...

dialogue.name: SANCHE
dialogue.text: But I was selfish...and that selfishness has brought you pain. For that, I am truly sorry...

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Mama!

dialogue.name: SANCHE
dialogue.text: My love... My light... I pray you find such happiness as I have known...

dialogue.name: SANCHE
dialogue.text: Thank you...all of you. Watch over her...

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: No... No. NO!!!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: This can't be happening... I promised Mama...

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除★）

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Oh no...

dialogue.name: BOSSWHM700
dialogue.text: (-Sinister Voice-)Mmm... So very close. Heed my words, then...

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: How long has this fiend lurked within Sanche, awaiting this very moment...?

dialogue.name: BOSSWHM700
dialogue.text: (-Sinister Voice-)Terrible child. Dragging around your sick mother. You have killed her! Accept the evil you have done, and atone with your very life!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: But, I didn't... I killed her...?

dialogue.name: BOSSWHM700
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除★）

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除★）

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Ignore it, Gatty!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text:
But I did bring Mama here...
It was me. I killed her...

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Aaah!!!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: The voidsent has sunk its hooks into Gatty's spirit. We must destroy it ere her life force is drained away!

dialogue.name: BOSSWHM700
dialogue.text: Revile what you have become, murderer! Surrender your life to me!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: We will help Gatty resist this trance, but the voidsent must be slain!

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Remember the elements, Gatty! Let wind and water calm your mind!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text:
Do not give in to despair!
It is what the voidsent wants!

dialogue.name: BOSSWHM700
dialogue.text: All who stand with you will die! Revel in the depth of your atrocity!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Sylphie!?

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text:
No, not you, too...
This is all my fault!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Aaaaaah!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: No! She's losing too much aether!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text:
I will try to staunch the flow.
Forename, slay the voidsent!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text:
The candle of life burns down for us all.
You cannot punish yourself...

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Gatty, remember what your mother wanted for you!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: What Mama wanted...?

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Yes, think back on her words!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Say them, Gatty! Hear yourself say them!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: “I pray you find such happiness...”

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text:
Well done, Forename!
I will rouse Sylphie─pray focus your art upon her.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text:
Thank you, Guildmaster.
Forename...I need your healing touch...

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: We won't let you go, Gatty!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Draw on our strength! Remember your mother's love!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: I... I'm in control now. Thank you...

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text:
Mama, I know what you wanted for me...
And I think I've found it...

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text:
You've done well, Gatty.
Now, let us banish this foul creature from our midst!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: Foolish girl! Your right to love is forfeit! You belong to me!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除★）

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Was this foe beyond us...?

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: I never should've... I'm sorry...

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text:
This can't be...
I gave all I had...

dialogue.name: BOSSWHM700
dialogue.text: Your feeble magicks are...ah...AAAHHH!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: With the voidsent vanquished, Gatty has been freed of its debilitating influence. We need not fear her losing control again.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: Gatty is a fighter, but I think she needs a strong shoulder right now...

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: When Mama died, it was as if I'd fallen into a deep, dark hole. My mind was full of screaming...and then I heard your voices from somewhere far away, calling me back.

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: I heard Mama's voice, too. That's when I knew that she would always be at my side...

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: I'll do my best to make her proud of me!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: With the strength you've shown, there is already much of which to be proud. Your aether is tranquil. Calm.

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: I see no need to enforce further training at the guild...though its doors are open to you, nonetheless. Will you return with us to Gridania?

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: ...I'd always thought Mama wanted to live alone with me, away from other people. So I tried to forget about wanting friends, or traveling to other places.

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: But now, I think what she really wanted was to let me find my own way. And thanks to Sylphie's lessons, there's no need to hide in the forest anymore.

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: I will go to Gridania. I want to study more conjury, and learn to fight fiends as well as Forename!

dialogue.name: GATTY
dialogue.text: And I still have so much to learn from Sylphie.

dialogue.name: SYLPHIE
dialogue.text: We'll keep studying together, I promise. Although we both have far to go before we're a match for Forename!

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: Well, well, Sylphie. Making promises to study? 'Twould seem that mentoring Gatty has proven beneficial to you both.

dialogue.name: ESUMIYAN
dialogue.text: 'Tis time we were on our way. We shall hold a memorial for Sanche, then see about settling you into your new life at Stillglade Fane.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This concludes the white mage quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: Stormblood. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
※ FINAL FANTASY XIV: Shadowbringers must be registered to your service account.
※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Shadowbringers.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: ※ You must have completed the role quest “The Soul of Temperance.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Once you have done so, the next white mage quest will be available from Raya–O–Senna.
